testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Davis
items.comment: WaveSpeed transformed my reports! It's amazing how much clearer my writing has become after removing filler words.

items.name: Jonathan Lane
items.comment: As a student, this tool has helped me meet word counts without unnecessary fluff. Highly recommend!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the Filler Word Remover

items.title: What types of words does the tool remove?
items.description: The tool removes common filler words such as 'just', 'really', 'very', 'basically', and others that clutter your text, enhancing focus and clarity.

items.title: Is it free to use?
items.description: Yes! You can process a set number of texts daily for free. For more features, consider our subscription options.

items.title: Can I use the processed text for any purpose?
items.description: Yes, you are free to use the improved text for both personal and commercial projects.

items.title: How does privacy work?
items.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your text is never stored or transmitted, ensuring your privacy is protected.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Writing?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the clarity it can bring. No sign-up required.
